sentences.en: A solidification simulation software for pressure die casting processes has been developed.
sentences.cn: 应用自行开发的低压铸造凝固模拟软件模拟低压铸造铝合金轮毂的凝固过程.

sentences.en: And the reaction rate the precipitate solidification is also discussed.
sentences.cn: 最后探讨了固化沉淀的反应速率.

sentences.en: Architecture, according to Goethe, " is the solidification of music. "
sentences.cn: 歌德说, 建筑是 “ 凝固的音乐 ”.

sentences.en: At this moment, my heart, to the surprisingly calm, memories, when the snow together make a snowman, snowball fights, sad tears with falling snow, fall in the snow, the instantaneous solidification.
sentences.cn: 此时此刻，我的心，出奇的平静，予回想里，那年雪里一起堆雪人，打雪仗，伤心的眼泪随着飘落的雪花，跌落在雪地里，瞬间凝固。

sentences.en: At this point, the whole of the same air as the solidification.
sentences.cn: 此时, 整个空气像凝固了一样.

sentences.en: Casting temperature have a little effect on the solidification end location.
sentences.cn: 浇注温度对铸坯的凝固末端位置也有一定影响.

sentences.en: Commonly, solid - liquid interfaces are planar, columnar or dendritic interfaces during solidification.
sentences.cn: 凝固时的固液界面通常为平面 、 胞状、枝晶状.

sentences.en: Effect of wave pulse current on solidification of ZA 27 alloy is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了方波脉冲电流对ZA27合金凝固组织的影响.

sentences.en: Formed by solidification from a molten state . Used of rocks.
sentences.cn: 由熔化的岩石凝固形成的.

sentences.en: High quality amorphous metals and alloys are made by rapid solidification technique.
sentences.cn: 性能优异的非晶态金属和合金是用急冷凝固技术制取的.

sentences.en: In winter, it's easy on solidification, glazing products surface brightness film UN - uniform.
sentences.cn: 不夏季, 上平油很容易固结, 上平产物的暗不天亮膜不平均.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the higher HDPEC discharge is beneficial to modification of solidification structure.
sentences.cn: 同时, 脉冲充电电压越高,凝固组织细化程度越大.

sentences.en: Otherwise, the solidification structure for different superheat was simulated.
sentences.cn: 在此基础上还模拟了不同过热度下铸坯的凝固组织.

sentences.en: Rapid solidification technology can improve organization and properties of magnesium alloys.
sentences.cn: 快速凝固技术是改善镁合金组织结构、提高镁合金各项性能的重要技术.

sentences.en: The heat of fusion is equal to the heat of solidification.
The numerical modeling of solidification process is moving from macro - to micro - modeling.
sentences.cn: 凝固过程的数值模拟正在由 宏观 向微观转变.

sentences.en: This is an algorithm solidification simulation about"multiple nodal region"in boundary node of casting and mold system.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了铸件铸型体系中异类材料分界面上“复合节点领域”的凝固计算。

sentences.en: To test solidification characteristics of various casting alloy accurately is very significant for optimizing casting technique and getting castings with sound property and appropriate dimensions.
sentences.cn: 精确测定不同铸造合金的凝固特性对于优化铸造工艺、获得满足性能和尺寸要求的铸件具有十分重要的意义。

words.tran_cn: 坚固地；坚硬地；团结一致地
凝固，团结（solidify的过去式和过去分词形式）
使凝固（solidify的ing形式）；使团结；使充实
